Sunday November 28 from 3:00 p.m. to 7:00 p.m at Triangle Park in downtown Lexington.  Street closures as follows:
S Broadway closed in both directions between W Vine St and W Main St.
W Main St closed at N Broadway.  Traffic will be diverted onto N Broadway towards Short St.
Northbound traffic on Broadway approaching Vine St will be diverted to Vine St.
Southbound traffic on Broadway approaching Short St will be diverted to Short St.
